snippet.title: Horizon Chase 2 - Official Trailer - Coming to Apple Arcade this September 9th
snippet.description:
Get your arcade racing crew together and embark on this new trip around the World with Horizon Chase 2. With online multiplayer support on all game modes, a brand-new customization feature and new visuals showing a beautifully crafted, vibrant and dynamic world, the evolution of arcade racing is going to hit Apple Arcade on September 9th!

Wishlist us: http://apple.co/-HorizonChase2
Get more info: http://www.horizonchase.com

Follow us on Social Media:
Twitter: http://twitter.com/horizonchase
Facebook: http://facebook.com/HorizonChase
Instagram: http://instagram.com/horizon_chase
Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/HorizonChase

#HorizonChase2, #HC2, #HorizonChase
